If the calling account had been revoked `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must be `callerConfirmation`. ls/introspection/ERC165.sol":{"keccak256":"0x9e8778b14317ba9e256c30a76fd6c32b960af621987f56069e1e819c77c6a133","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://1777404f1dcd0fac188e55a288724ec3c67b45288e49cc64723e95e702b49ab8","dweb:/ipfs/QmZFdC626GButBApwDUvvTnUzdinevC3B24d7yyh57XkiA"]},"lib/openzeppelin-contracts/contracts/utils/introspection/IERC165.sol":{"keccak256":"0x4296879f55019b23e135000eb36896057e7101fb7fb859c5ef690cf14643757b","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://87b3541437c8c443ccd36795e56a338ed12855eec17f8da624511b8d1a7e14df","dweb:/ipfs/QmeJQCtZrQjtJLr6u7ZHWeH3pBnjtLWzvRrKViAi7UZqxL"]},"src/Faillapop_DAO.sol":{"keccak256":"0x5f6877934bae078b4d7b84b4532e92f767d369c1a6a752b3312df71ef5c61b7c","license":"GPL-3.0","urls":["bzz-raw://c858d5a3d6947dd83bc98401fe8f0756cc1b6aeb52fb3a557225197dee9e4438","dweb:/ipfs/QmW93qsVnGFghrDsy45hoaMLBB8uvcvpmuWSawcih645g4"]},"src/interfaces/IFP_CoolNFT.sol":{"keccak256":"0xe46a431e820c326eb4e87b10d69b6e1815bf563cdf9f8f1801015cba0544b8ee","license":"GPL-3.0","urls":["bzz-raw://01997c13aacb7c19820fa15be19bd5e26ccd8e5e8371b964cbceaf5556bc4afe","dweb:/ipfs/QmWRGzhgDHgMuk5g2ZeipPnScFztS6e9tuGqrw7uT2tnwg"]},"src/interfaces/IFP_DAO.sol":{"keccak256":"0x932d7bb21237f351608e2920fbe82887eab5cfb86ef0f5fb3591b2963276bc8a","license":"GPL-3.0","urls":["bzz-raw://12efb0b9d064b535a9a05081a5c1662f86c6bff051a71fb88ae6285de4abe77f","dweb:/ipfs/QmX6bx41rqZncwpfz5xUM5jvFPb8cjyU6WfAZrrGcf9kaN"]},"src/interfaces/IFP_Shop.sol":{"keccak256":"0x9e05b9cb7fc6ef6e45246bdf8adcaeaa561899d5b0902bb49a4e4ec6219ba0b4","license":"GPL-3.0","urls":["bzz-raw://7936ed36632e08307f64b2cd4c7a125449e5e0241f6f22a410905b326924b953","dweb:/ipfs/QmS49RX5Dz6SiyZiNNoj94sceX6Q8uktqWRNoHpzCV5Q4t"]}},"version":1}

params.disputeId: The ID of the target dispute
The ID of the target dispute
params.vote: The vote, true for FOR, false for AGAINST

params.disputeId: The ID of the target dispute

params.fptAddress: The address of the FPT token
params.magicWord: The password to access key features
params.nftAddress: The address of the NFT contract

params.disputeId: The ID of the target dispute

getRoleAdmin(bytes32).details: Returns the admin role that controls `role`. See {grantRole} and {revokeRole}. To change a role's admin, use {_setRoleAdmin}.

grantRole(bytes32,address).details: Grants `role` to `account`. If `account` had not been already granted `role`, emits a {RoleGranted} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role. May emit a {RoleGranted} event.

params.buyerReasoning: The reasoning of the buyer in favor of the claim
params.itemId: The ID of the item involved in the dispute
params.sellerReasoning: The reasoning of the seller against the claim

params.disputeId: The ID of the target dispute
The ID of the target dispute

renounceRole(bytes32,address).details: Revokes `role` from the calling account. Roles are often managed via {grantRole} and {revokeRole}: this function's purpose is to provide a mechanism for accounts to lose their privileges if they are compromised (such as when a trusted device is misplaced). If the calling account had been revoked `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must be `callerConfirmation`. May emit a {RoleRevoked} event.

revokeRole(bytes32,address).details: Revokes `role` from `account`. If `account` had been granted `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role. May emit a {RoleRevoked} event.

params.newMagicWord: The new password to access key features
params.newNft: The new address of the NFT contract
params.newShop: The new address of the Shop contract

CONTROL_ROLE().notice: The Control role ID for the AccessControl contract. At first it's the msg.sender and then the shop.

DEFAULT_QUORUM().notice: The default number of voters for passing a vote

THRESHOLD().notice: The threshold for the random number generator

cancelDispute(uint256).notice: Cancel an ongoing dispute. Either by the buyer or blacklisting (shop contract)

castVote(uint256,bool).notice: Cast a vote on a dispute

checkLottery(uint256).notice: Randomly award an NFT to a user if they voten for the winning side

endDispute(uint256).notice: Resolve a dispute if enough users have voted and remove it from the storage

nextDisputeId().notice: The ID of the next dispute to be created

queryDispute(uint256).notice: Query the details of a dispute

queryDisputeResult(uint256).notice: Query the result of a dispute

quorum().notice: Min number of people to pass a proposal

setShop(address).notice: Sets the shop address as the new Control role
